snippet: The Pentagon needs clear rules on misconduct, and they should apply to all serving personnel, regardless of rank or gender.
abstract: Editorial contends scandal unfolding around resignation of David Petraeus is reminder that military has long had culture of impunity that seemed to shield high ranking officers for sexual misconduct; calls on Pentagon to enforce military's standards of sexual conduct more consistently, especially against male commanders of senior rank.
lead_paragraph: The Pentagon needs clear rules on misconduct, and they should apply to all serving personnel, regardless of rank or gender.

headline.seo: One Lesson From the David Petraeus Scandal
headline.main: One Lesson From a Messy Scandal
headline.print_headline: One Lesson From a Messy Scandal

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
